li.a: Request for Use of School Facilities & Grounds

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.h1: LOOK WHAT'S HAPPENING IN BEAR COUNTRY

div.p: The EASD Board of Education will hold its regularly scheduled April workshop session on Tuesday, April 14 at 6 p.m. The meeting is open to the public and will be conducted in a virtual format only.

a.title: Go to comments for Virtual School Board Meeting - April 14, 2020

div.p: EASD is committed to the safety and well-being of our students. We recognize the global health crisis centered around the Coronavirus outbreak is causing stress and anxiety among our students, staff, and parents.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Mental Health Resources

div.p: Since launching our Enrichment and Review platforms this morning, we have received several communications from parents informing us that the Schoology platform was not working.

a.title: Go to comments for Schoology Platform Service Interruption

div.p: The Board of Education will now hold its March 31, 2020, action meeting online using the Zoom platform. You will be able to join the Zoom Meeting from a computer, mobile device, or tablet to listen to this meeting.

a.title: Go to comments for Virtual School Board Meeting - March 31, 2020

img.alt: Obtaining a Work Permit During School Closure

a.span: Obtaining a Work Permit During School Closure

div.p: In Pennsylvania, minors between the ages of 1418 must obtain a Work Permit. Work Permits cannot be issued to children under the age of 14.

a.title: Go to comments for Obtaining a Work Permit During School Closure

div.p: The Elizabethtown Area School District school board meeting scheduled for Tuesday, March 24, 2020 has been postponed.

a.title: Go to comments for EASD School Board Meeting Postponed

img.alt: EASD Celebrates Read Across America Day

a.span: EASD Celebrates Read Across America Day

div.p: On March 2, students, faculty, and staff from the Elizabethtown Area School District joined millions of their peers from around the country in celebrating Read Across America Day.

a.title: Go to comments for EASD Celebrates Read Across America Day

img.alt: Bear Creek Students honored as Februarys Leader In Me Students of the Month

a.span: Bear Creek Students honored as Februarys Leader In Me Students of the Month

div.p: Twenty-five students from the Bear Creek School were recently recognized as Februarys Leader In Me Students of the Month.

a.title: Go to comments for Bear Creek Students honored as Februarys Leader In Me Students of the Month

img.alt: Students prepare Winter Blues Care packages for their teachers

a.span: Students prepare Winter Blues Care packages for their teachers

div.p: East High Street Elementary Schools Junior Lighthouse team delivered their gratitude to their teachers at the school by assembling Winter Blues Care Packages for each classroom.

a.title: Go to comments for Students prepare Winter Blues Care packages for their teachers

img.alt: EAHS Students Perform at All-County Band Festival

a.span: EAHS Students Perform at All-County Band Festival

div.p: Nine students from Elizabethtown Area High School performed at the 2020 Lancaster-Lebanon Music Educators Association (LLMEA) County Band North Festival.

a.title: Go to comments for EAHS Students Perform at All-County Band Festival

img.alt: EAHS To Present Tony Award-winning musical Shrek March 12th, 13th & 14th

a.span: EAHS To Present Tony Award-winning musical Shrek March 12th, 13th & 14th

div.p: EAHS is proud to present its spring musical, Shrek The Musical, on Thursday, March 12 at 7 p.m., Friday, March 13 at 7 p.m., and Saturday, March 14 at 1 p.m. and 7 p.m.

a.title: Go to comments for EAHS To Present Tony Award-winning musical Shrek March 12th, 13th & 14th

img.alt: EAHS announces Mini-THON and Community Hours

a.span: EAHS announces Mini-THON and Community Hours

div.p: Elizabethtown Area High School will hold its twelfth annual Mini-THON this year on March 6-7, 2020, to benefit the Four Diamonds.

a.title: Go to comments for EAHS announces Mini-THON and Community Hours

img.alt: EAHS students place at SkillsUSA competition

a.span: EAHS students place at SkillsUSA competition

div.p: EAHS seniors Alexander Miller and Devan Bickhart recently earned awards at the District 5 SkillsUSA event held at the Franklin County Career and Technology Center.

a.title: Go to comments for EAHS students place at SkillsUSA competition

img.alt: EAHS Announces Second Marking Period Honor Roll

a.span: EAHS Announces Second Marking Period Honor Roll

div.p: EAHS principal Maura Hobson, as well as assistant principals Robert Crick, Kathleen Griffith, and Dr. Jason Potts, have announced the honor roll for the second marking period of the 2019-2020 school year.

a.title: Go to comments for EAHS Announces Second Marking Period Honor Roll

img.alt: EAHS students sing at District Choral Concert

a.span: EAHS students sing at District Choral Concert

div.p: Five choral students from EAHS were selected to the highly competitive Pennsylvania Music Educators Association District 7 chorus. Selected to the honors choir were Emma Boksan, Adam Evans, Claire Fritz, Ronnie Mautner, and Jake Sevcik.

a.title: Go to comments for EAHS students sing at District Choral Concert

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.p: Posted April 6, 2020

a.title: Go to comments for Elementary Progress Reports - Second Trimester
